mapper.select: SELECT org_id, top_id, parent_id, org_level, org_name, enabled, updater, creator, update_time, create_time FROM sys_organization
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_organization ( org_id, top_id, parent_id, org_level, org_name, updater, creator ) VALUES ( #{org_id}, #{top_id}, #{parent_id}, #{org_level}, #{org_name}, #{updater}, #{creator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE works.sys_organization SET deleted = 1 WHERE org_id = #{org_id}
